title: AWS Solution Architect - AI Consulting Specialist
details: We are seeking an experienced AWS Solution Architect with deep AI expertise to join our consulting team. This role involves designing and implementing cloud-native AI solutions, working directly with enterprise clients, and driving technical strategy for AI/ML initiatives.
requirements: Deep expertise in AI/ML services (SageMaker, Bedrock, Comprehend)
Experience with consulting and client engagement
Strong knowledge of cloud-native AI architectures
Experience with data engineering and MLOps
AWS Solutions Architect Professional certification preferred
responsibilities: Design scalable AI solutions on AWS
Lead technical discussions with C-suite executives
Architect data pipelines for AI workloads
Provide technical guidance to development teams
Drive AI strategy and implementation roadmaps
legalStatus: H1B sponsorship available, open to visa holders
